name: ColomboGuide
0:
”Alexa, open Colombo guide”
”Alexa, open Colombo guide for local news”
”Alexa, ask Colombo guide for the top five things to do”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: colombo guide
des: Colombo guide provides you with useful travel information about the City of Colombo, which is the business capital of Sri Lanka. The skill also gives you the latest news about Sri Lanka.
